strings.STORY_1: Awesomepants! We need you! Our department is swamped with cases!
strings.STORY_2: You can solve cases in record time! Under 10 seconds I heard?
strings.STORY_3: Alright! There's no time to lose! I expect the best out of you! Don't let me down
strings.CONFESSION_BEACHGUY: Damn you Awesomepants! I would have gotten away with it if it wasn't for your pesky investigation!
strings.CONFESSION_HIPSTER: Awesomepants? Hah, anyone who checked my Instagram could tell you I killed him! My followers are way better than you!
strings.CONFESSION_ASTRONAUT: I murdered him. On the moon! Isn't that outside the reach of the law? No? Oh. F***
